Blue-throated AvalokiteÅ›vara DhÄraá¹‡Ä«, 1 fascicle. Blue-throated Great Compassion
Heart MudrÄ: Join the palms with the two index fingers bent,

each touching the second joint of the two thumbs. This is the Dharma conch. The two middle fingers are erect and joined, forming the lotus. The two ring fingers are erect and rounded, forming the wheel. The two little fingers are straight and joined, forming the staff. Within a single mudrÄ, all four mudrÄs are complete,
namely the Dharma conch, lotus, wheel, and staff.
